member.name: T:TireTreadsService.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TireTreadsService.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TireTreadsService.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:TireTreadsService.SqlQueries
member.summary: Provides reusable SQL queries used throughout the TireTreadsService.

member.name: F:TireTreadsService.SqlQueries.GetCompanies
member.summary: Returns all companies with associated district and area names.

member.name: F:TireTreadsService.SqlQueries.GetManufacturers
member.summary: Returns all manufacturer descriptions that are tire-related, enabled, and not empty.

member.name: M:TireTreadsService.SqlQueries.GetInventoryQuery(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Builds an inventory query filtered by company IDs and tire brand names.
member.returns: A complete SQL string with embedded filters.
